dresser noun [C]
(CLOTHES)
used in phrases that describe the type of clothes that someone wears: She was always a very stylish dresser. He's a very snappy (= stylish and modern) dresser.
theatre & film
  specialized a person who works in the theatre or in films, helping the actors to put on their clothes
